  • Ezekiel 48
1 And She said unto me: 'Daughter of woman, eat that which thou findest; eat this roll, and go, speak unto the house of Israel.' 2 So I opened my mouth, and She caused me to eat that roll. 3 And She said unto me: 'Daughter of woman, cause thy belly to eat, and fill thy bowels with this roll that I give thee.' Then did I eat it; and it was in my mouth as honey for sweetness.

 4 And She said unto me: 'Daughter of woman, go, get thee unto the house of Israel, and speak with My words unto them. 5 For thou art not sent to a people of an unintelligible speech and of a slow tongue, but to the house of Israel; 6 not to many peoples of an unintelligible speech and of a slow tongue, whose words thou canst not understand. Surely, if I sent thee to them, they would hearken unto thee. 7 But the house of Israel will not consent to hearken unto thee; for they consent not to hearken unto Me; for all the house of Israel are of a hard forehead and of a stiff heart. 8 Behold, I have made thy face hard against their faces, and thy forehead hard against their foreheads. 9 As an adamant harder than flint have I made thy forehead; fear them not, neither be dismayed at their looks, for they are a rebellious house.'

 10 Moreover She said unto me: 'Daughter of woman, all My words that I shall speak unto thee receive in thy heart, and hear with thine ears. 11 And go, get thee to them of the captivity, unto the children of thy people, and speak unto them, and tell them: Thus saith the Domina GOD; whether they will hear, or whether they will forbear.' 12 Then a spirit lifted me up, and I heard behind me the voice of a great rushing: 'Blessed be the glory of the Domina from Her place'; 13 also the noise of the wings of the living creatures as they touched one another, and the noise of the wheels beside them, even the noise of a great rushing.
14 So a spirit lifted me up, and took me away; and I went in bitterness, in the heat of my spirit, and the hand of the Domina was strong upon me. 15 Then I came to them of the captivity at Tel-abib, that dwelt by the river Chebar, and I sat where they sat; and I remained there appalled among them seven days. 16 And it came to pass at the end of seven days,

that the word of the Domina came unto me, saying: 17 'Daughter of woman, I have appointed thee a watchwoman unto the house of Israel; and when thou shalt hear a word at My mouth, thou shalt give them warning from Me. 18 When I say unto the wicked: Thou shalt surely die; and thou givest her not warning, nor speakest to warn the wicked from her wicked way, to save her life; the same wicked woman shall die in her iniquity, but her blood will I require at thy hand. 19 Yet if thou warn the wicked, and she turn not from her wickedness, nor from her wicked way, she shall die in her iniquity; but thou hast delivered thy soul. 20 Again, when a righteous woman doth turn from her righteousness, and commit iniquity, I will lay a stumblingblock before her, she shall die; because thou hast not given her warning, she shall die in her sin, and her righteous deeds which she hath done shall not be remembered; but her blood will I require at thy hand. 21 Nevertheless if thou warn the righteous woman, that the righteous sin not, and she doth not sin, she shall surely live, because she took warning; and thou hast delivered thy soul.'

 22 And the hand of the Domina came there upon me; and She said unto me: 'Arise, go forth into the plain, and I will there speak with thee.' 23 Then I arose, and went forth into the plain; and, behold, the glory of the Domina stood there, as the glory which I saw by the river Chebar; and I fell on my face. 24 Then spirit entered into me, and set me upon my feet; and She spoke with me, and said unto me: 'Go, shut thyself within thy house. 25 But thou, daughter of woman, behold, bands shall be put upon thee, and thou shalt be bound with them, and thou shalt not go out among them; 26 and I will make thy tongue cleave to the roof of thy mouth, that thou shalt be dumb, and shalt not be to them a reprover; for they are a rebellious house.
